casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America v. S. WAGONER, Guardian of Walter C. McFarland, Inc. No. 476. Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. April 30, 1931. John M. Goldesberry, U. S. Atty., of Tulsa, Okl. Tom W. Garrett, of Oklahoma City, Okl., for appellee.

Before LEWIS, PHILLIPS, and Mc-DERMOTT, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed April 30, 1931, on motion of appellant.
